name: Fake Your Own Re-election
description:
How does a dictator stay in power? He needs a bit of help. Thank goodness you are here to provide it!

Survive 10 weeks as Head of the Central Election Committee of the Republic of New Krakozhia. Rig the election. Stay on the good side of your boss. But don't anger the people too much — you don't want to provoke mass protests. Or do you?

If you are one of those people who donate to free games on Itch, you may have noticed this one does not have a Donate option. Instead, please consider donating to victims of political repression and police violence here: https://www.facebook.com/donate/1123543824684874/1179674872398974/ or here: https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-liberate-people-of-belarus.
